title: All chinese player have a look this, there is a fking racist in the game said everyone hate chinese.
body: This is his account GGDADADEROH.  if you play with him one day plz dont forget to report him. i upload the chatting history.

replies.body:
Read [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) before posting.

Do not name-and-shame. It only results in even worse behaviour in the community.
